text: The Power and the Prize is a 1956 American drama movie directed by Henry Koster and starring Robert Taylor, Burl Ives, Mary Astor, Cedric Hardwicke, Charles Coburn, Elisabeth Muller. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1957. ==Other websites== * Category:1956 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Henry Koster
title: The Power and the Prize
